name: Game Room
longDes: You have entered the Game Room, this looks like fun. In the center of the room is a dusty ^pool# table. To the West is a large picture ^window#. There is a ^painting# along one wall. A ^fireplace# stands on the east wall, and looks as if it hasn't been used in ages. There is a door with fogged glass to the $North#; You wonder where it leads. To the $South# is a door leading back to the library. To the $East# is a door that appears to lead to a small bathroom.
shortDes: You are in the mansion game room. A ^pool# table occupies the center of the room, and a ^fireplace# stands cold and dark. A ^window# to the west looks out to woods adjacent to the house. There is a door to the $North# that leads to the solarium. A small blue door to the $East# goes to a small bathroom. To the $South# is a door to the library.

features.name: fireplace
features.preActionDes: This fireplace looks like it hasn't been used (or cleaned) in years.
features.inActionDes: You throw the ashes into the fire. The ashes instantly set a fire ablaze and a poltergeist appears!
features.postActionDes: The dimly lit fireplace is still glowing. You're not sure how the ashes caused the fireplace to start.

features.name: pool
features.preActionDes: This pool table looks fun. Perhaps you could play with the poltergeist?
features.inActionDes: You play a round of pool with the Poltergeist. He beat you after you scratched attempting to pocket the 8-ball.
features.postActionDes: You lost this game. Perhaps it's better to have kept the Poltergeist happy.

features.name: painting
features.preActionDes: You take a closer look at the painting. It's dogs playing poker!

features.name: window
features.preActionDes: You look out the window. All you can see is the beginning of a dense forest.

features.name: poltergeist
features.preActionDes: The poltergeist hovers near the fireplace, looking at you curiously.
features.inActionDes: You shoot the poltergeist with the gun. Immediately the ghost changes color and flies into a rage.
